about-presentation: Hi, my name is Henry Lucca, I'm 21 years old and i'm a brazilian developer.

about-presentation-3: I'm an energetic person always looking for new challenges and knowledge.
about-presentation-4: I'm currently studying at the Catholic University of Pernambuco (UNICAP) and i'm in the 7th period of the Computer Science course.
